price: 33.Nabii Muusa yi-Rabbow diggah anu firqawni marak num qideeh usun yoo qidaanamak meesita iyye.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي قَتَلۡتُ مِنۡهُمۡ نَفۡسٗا فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī qataltu min'hum nafsan fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
